channel.title: How do you rotate an npc?
channel.description: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2jtw5l.png[/img] I want to turn those baby dragons (And other npcs) Facing a different direction. Is a way to do it?

item.title: How do you rotate an npc?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:11, topic:266646”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=352131.msg2701395#msg2701395 date=1236632260]

idk

dont spam…

you cannot turn npcs rotations but you can make them walk around.
[/quote]
Wrong.

idk

Don’t spam.

On Topic -
I don’t think it’s possible. Not sure though.

It’s possible.

It’s called an Update Mask.[/quote]
You’re never on MSN. >.<

Read full topic

item.title: How do you rotate an npc?
item.dc:creator: @xX_Energy_xX xX_Energy_xX
item.description:
@xX_Energy_xX wrote:

here’s how:
to rotate, go to autospawn.cfg
find the npc your looking for
go to the end and find the “1”
here’s how if your confused.

spawn = 545 3339 3258 0 0 0 0 0 1,2,3,or 4

Read full topic
